metadata.title: CVE-2021-42378 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A use-after-free in Busybox's awk applet leads to denial of service and possibly code execution when processing a crafted awk pattern in the getvar_i function

advisory.discovered_by: Vera Mens, Uri Katz, Tal Keren, Sharon Brizinov, and Shachar Menashe

criterions.comment: busybox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.30.1-6ubuntu2.1').
